"<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"utf-8\"?>\n<rss xmlns:dc=\"http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/\" xmlns:content=\"http://purl.org/rss/1.0/modules/content/\" xmlns:foaf=\"http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/\" xmlns:og=\"http://ogp.me/ns#\" xmlns:rdfs=\"http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#\" xmlns:schema=\"http://schema.org/\" xmlns:sioc=\"http://rdfs.org/sioc/ns#\" xmlns:sioct=\"http://rdfs.org/sioc/types#\" xmlns:skos=\"http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#\" xmlns:xsd=\"http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#\" version=\"2.0\" xml:base=\"https://us-cert.cisa.gov/\">\n  <channel>\n    <title> CISA Bulletins</title>\n    <link>https://us-cert.cisa.gov/</link>\n    <description>Alerts warn about vulnerabilities, incidents, and other security issues that pose a significant risk.</description>\n    <language>en</language>\n    \n    <item>\n\t<title>Vulnerability Summary for the Week of December 16, 2020</title>\n\t<link>https://us-cert.cisa.gov/ncas/bulletins/sb20-356</link>\n\t<description>Original release date: December 21, 2020&lt;br/&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;a name=\"high\"&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\n\n&lt;div id=\"high_v\"&gt;\n&lt;h2 id=\"high_v_title\"&gt;High Vulnerabilities&lt;/h2&gt;\n\n&lt;table align=\"center\" border=\"1\" style=\"table-layout: fixed; width: 100%;\" summary=\"High Vulnerabilities\"&gt;\n\t&lt;thead&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;th class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"col\" style=\"width:24%;\"&gt;Primary&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\tVendor -- Product&lt;/th&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;th scope=\"col\" style=\"width:44%;\"&gt;Description&lt;/th&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;th scope=\"col\" style=\"width:10%;\"&gt;Published&lt;/th&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;th scope=\"col\" style=\"width:8%;\"&gt;CVSS Score&lt;/th&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;th scope=\"col\" style=\"width:14%;\"&gt;Source &amp;amp; Patch Info&lt;/th&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t&lt;/thead&gt;\n\t&lt;tbody&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;adremsoft -- netcrunch&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;AdRem NetCrunch 10.6.0.4587 has a hardcoded SSL private key vulnerability in the NetCrunch web client. The same hardcoded SSL private key is used across different customers' installations when no other SSL certificate is installed, which allows remote attackers to defeat cryptographic protection mechanisms by leveraging knowledge of this key from another installation.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-16&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2019-14482&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:L/Au:N/C:C/I:C/A:C\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;10&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2019-14482\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2019-14482&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://compass-security.com/fileadmin/Research/Advisories/2020-16_CSNC-2019-017_AdRem_NetCrunch_Hardcoded_SSL_Private_Key.txt\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://www.adremsoft.com/support/\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;adremsoft -- netcrunch&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;AdRem NetCrunch 10.6.0.4587 allows Remote Code Execution. In the NetCrunch web client, a read-only administrator can execute arbitrary code on the server running the NetCrunch server software.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-16&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2019-14479&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:L/Au:S/C:C/I:C/A:C\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;9&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2019-14479\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2019-14479&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://compass-security.com/fileadmin/Research/Advisories/2020-13_CSNC-2019-014_AdRem_NetCrunch_Remote_Code_Execution.txt\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://www.adremsoft.com/support/\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;adremsoft -- netcrunch&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;AdRem NetCrunch 10.6.0.4587 allows Credentials Disclosure. Every user can read the BSD, Linux, MacOS and Solaris private keys, private keys' passwords, and root passwords stored in the credential manager. Every administrator can read the ESX and Windows passwords stored in the credential manager.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-16&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2019-14483&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:L/Au:S/C:C/I:C/A:C\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;9&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2019-14483\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2019-14483&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://compass-security.com/fileadmin/Research/Advisories/2020-17_CSNC-2019-018_AdRem_NetCrunch_Credentials_Disclosure.txt\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://www.adremsoft.com/support/\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;adremsoft -- netcrunch&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;AdRem NetCrunch 10.6.0.4587 has an Improper Session Handling vulnerability in the NetCrunch web client, which can lead to an authentication bypass or escalation of privileges.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-16&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2019-14480&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:L/Au:N/C:P/I:P/A:P\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;7.5&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2019-14480\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2019-14480&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://compass-security.com/fileadmin/Research/Advisories/2020-14_CSNC-2019-015_AdRem_NetCrunch_Improper_Session_Handling.txt\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://www.adremsoft.com/support/\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;altran -- picotcp&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;An issue was discovered in picoTCP through 1.7.0. The DNS domain name record decompression functionality in pico_dns_decompress_name() in pico_dns_common.c does not validate the compression pointer offset values with respect to the actual data present in a DNS response packet, causing out-of-bounds writes that lead to Denial-of-Service and Remote Code Execution.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-11&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2020-24338&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:L/Au:N/C:P/I:P/A:P\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;7.5&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-24338\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-24338&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://us-cert.cisa.gov/ics/advisories/icsa-20-343-01\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://www.kb.cert.org/vuls/id/815128\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;apache -- struts&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;Forced OGNL evaluation, when evaluated on raw user input in tag attributes, may lead to remote code execution. Affected software : Apache Struts 2.0.0 - Struts 2.5.25.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-11&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2020-17530&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:L/Au:N/C:P/I:P/A:P\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;7.5&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-17530\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-17530&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"http://jvn.jp/en/jp/JVN43969166/index.html\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;JVN&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/WW/S2-061\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CONFIRM&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;appbase -- streams&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;The Appbase streams Docker image 2.1.2 contains a blank password for the root user. Systems deployed using affected versions of the streams container may allow a remote attacker to achieve root access with a blank password.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-16&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2020-35468&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:L/Au:N/C:C/I:C/A:C\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;10&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-35468\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-35468&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://github.com/donghyunlee00/CVE/blob/main/CVE-2020-35468\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;arubanetworks -- arubaos&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;There are multiple buffer overflow vulnerabilities that could lead to unauthenticated remote code execution by sending especially crafted packets destined to the PAPI (Aruba Networks AP management protocol) UDP port (8211) of access-points or controllers in Aruba 9000 Gateway; Aruba 7000 Series Mobility Controllers; Aruba 7200 Series Mobility Controllers version(s): 2.1.0.1, 2.2.0.0 and below; 6.4.4.23, 6.5.4.17, 8.2.2.9, 8.3.0.13, 8.5.0.10, 8.6.0.5, 8.7.0.0 and below; 6.4.4.23, 6.5.4.17, 8.2.2.9, 8.3.0.13, 8.5.0.10, 8.6.0.5, 8.7.0.0 and below.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-11&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2020-24633&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:L/Au:N/C:C/I:C/A:C\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;10&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-24633\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-24633&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://support.hpe.com/hpsc/doc/public/display?docLocale=en_US&amp;amp;docId=emr_na-hpesbnw04072en_us\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CONFIRM&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;arubanetworks -- arubaos&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;An attacker is able to remotely inject arbitrary commands by sending especially crafted packets destined to the PAPI (Aruba Networks AP Management protocol) UDP port (8211) of access-pointsor controllers in Aruba 9000 Gateway; Aruba 7000 Series Mobility Controllers; Aruba 7200 Series Mobility Controllers version(s): 2.1.0.1, 2.2.0.0 and below; 6.4.4.23, 6.5.4.17, 8.2.2.9, 8.3.0.13, 8.5.0.10, 8.6.0.5, 8.7.0.0 and below ; 6.4.4.23, 6.5.4.17, 8.2.2.9, 8.3.0.13, 8.5.0.10, 8.6.0.5, 8.7.0.0 and below.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-11&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2020-24634&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:L/Au:N/C:C/I:C/A:C\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;10&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-24634\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-24634&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://support.hpe.com/hpsc/doc/public/display?docLocale=en_US&amp;amp;docId=emr_na-hpesbnw04072en_us\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CONFIRM&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;arubanetworks -- arubaos&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;Two vulnerabilities in ArubaOS GRUB2 implementation allows for an attacker to bypass secureboot. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability this could lead to remote compromise of system integrity by allowing an attacker to load an untrusted or modified kernel in Aruba 9000 Gateway; Aruba 7000 Series Mobility Controllers; Aruba 7200 Series Mobility Controllers version(s): 2.1.0.1, 2.2.0.0 and below; 6.4.4.23, 6.5.4.17, 8.2.2.9, 8.3.0.13, 8.5.0.10, 8.6.0.5, 8.7.0.0 and below ; 6.4.4.23, 6.5.4.17, 8.2.2.9, 8.3.0.13, 8.5.0.10, 8.6.0.5, 8.7.0.0 and below.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-11&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2020-24637&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:L/Au:S/C:C/I:C/A:C\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;9&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-24637\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-24637&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://support.hpe.com/hpsc/doc/public/display?docLocale=en_US&amp;amp;docId=emr_na-hpesbnw04072en_us\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CONFIRM&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;askey -- ap5100w_firmware&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;Network Analysis functionality in Askey AP5100W_Dual_SIG_1.01.097 and all prior versions allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands via a shell metacharacter in the ping, traceroute, or route options.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-11&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2020-15357&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:L/Au:N/C:C/I:C/A:C\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;10&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-15357\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-15357&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://medium.com/csg-govtech/bolstering-security-how-i-breached-a-wifi-mesh-access-point-from-close-proximity-to-uncover-f8f77dc3cd5d\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://starlabs.sg/advisories/\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://www.askey.com.tw/incident_report_notifications.html\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;blackfire -- blackfire&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;The Blackfire Docker image through 2020-12-14 contains a blank password for the root user. Systems deployed using affected versions of the Blackfire container may allow a remote attacker to achieve root access with a blank password.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-15&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2020-35466&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:L/Au:N/C:C/I:C/A:C\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;10&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-35466\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-35466&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://github.com/donghyunlee00/CVE/blob/main/CVE-2020-35466\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;car_rental_management_system_project -- car_rental_management_system&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;An issue was discovered in Car Rental Management System 1.0. An unauthenticated user can perform a file inclusion attack against the /index.php file with a partial filename in the \"page\" parameter, to cause local file inclusion resulting in code execution.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-14&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2020-29227&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:L/Au:N/C:P/I:P/A:P\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;7.5&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-29227\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-29227&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://loopspell.medium.com/cve-2020-29227-unauthenticated-local-file-inclusion-7d3bd2c5c6a5\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://www.sourcecodester.com/php/14544/car-rental-management-system-using-phpmysqli-source-code.html\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;citrix -- gateway_plug-in&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;Improper privilege management on services run by Citrix Gateway Plug-in for Windows, versions before and including 13.0-61.48 and 12.1-58.15, lead to privilege escalation attacks&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-14&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2020-8257&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:L/Au:N/C:P/I:P/A:P\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;7.5&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-8257\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-8257&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://support.citrix.com/article/CTX282684\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;citrix -- virtual_apps_and_desktops&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;An authorised user on a Windows host running Citrix Universal Print Server can perform arbitrary command execution as SYSTEM in CVAD versions before 2009, 1912 LTSR CU1 hotfixes CTX285870 and CTX286120, 7.15 LTSR CU6 hotfix CTX285344 and 7.6 LTSR CU9.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-14&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2020-8283&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:L/Au:S/C:C/I:C/A:C\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;9&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-8283\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-8283&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://support.citrix.com/article/CTX285059\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;connection-tester_project -- connection-tester&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;This affects the package connection-tester before 0.2.1. The injection point is located in line 15 in index.js. The following PoC demonstrates the vulnerability:&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-16&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2020-7781&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:L/Au:N/C:P/I:P/A:P\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;7.5&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-7781\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-7781&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://github.com/skoranga/node-connection-tester/pull/10\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CONFIRM&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://snyk.io/vuln/SNYK-JS-CONNECTIONTESTER-1048337\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CONFIRM&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;contiki-ng -- contiki-ng&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;An issue was discovered in Contiki through 3.0 and Contiki-NG through 4.5. The code for parsing Type A domain name answers in ip64-dns64.c doesn't verify whether the address in the answer's length is sane. Therefore, when copying an address of an arbitrary length, a buffer overflow can occur. This bug can be exploited whenever NAT64 is enabled.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-11&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2020-24336&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:L/Au:N/C:P/I:P/A:P\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;7.5&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-24336\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-24336&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://us-cert.cisa.gov/ics/advisories/icsa-20-343-01\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://www.kb.cert.org/vuls/id/815128\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;contiki-os -- contiki-os&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;An issue was discovered in the IPv6 stack in Contiki through 3.0. There is an insufficient check for the IPv6 header length. This leads to Denial-of-Service and potential Remote Code Execution via a crafted ICMPv6 echo packet.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-11&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2020-25111&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:L/Au:N/C:P/I:P/A:P\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;7.5&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-25111\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-25111&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://us-cert.cisa.gov/ics/advisories/icsa-20-343-01\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://www.kb.cert.org/vuls/id/815128\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;contiki-os -- contiki-os&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;An issue was discovered in the IPv6 stack in Contiki through 3.0. There are inconsistent checks for IPv6 header extension lengths. This leads to Denial-of-Service and potential Remote Code Execution via a crafted ICMPv6 echo packet.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-11&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; The injection point is located in line 10 in 'index.js.' It depends on a vulnerable package 'corenlp-js-interface.' Vulnerability can be exploited with the following PoC:&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-11&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2020-28439&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:L/Au:N/C:P/I:P/A:P\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;7.5&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-28439\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-28439&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://snyk.io/vuln/SNYK-JS-CORENLPJSPREFAB-1050434\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CONFIRM&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;coscale_agent_project -- coscale_agent&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;Version 3.16.0 of the CoScale agent Docker image contains a blank password for the root user. Certain functionality in the Unified Services Router web interface could allow an authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands, due to a lack of validation of inputs provided in multipart HTTP POST requests.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-15&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2020-25759&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:L/Au:S/C:C/I:C/A:C\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;9&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-25759\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-25759&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://supportannouncement.us.dlink.com/announcement/publication.aspx?name=SAP10195\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://www.digitaldefense.com/news/zero-day-vuln-d-link-vpn-routers/\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://www.dlink.com/en/security-bulletin\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;dlink -- dsr-150_firmware&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;An issue was discovered on D-Link DSR-250 3.17 devices. Insufficient validation of configuration file checksums could allow a remote, authenticated attacker to inject arbitrary crontab entries into saved configurations before uploading. These entries are executed as root.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-15&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2020-25758&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:L/Au:S/C:C/I:C/A:C\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;9&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-25758\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-25758&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://supportannouncement.us.dlink.com/announcement/publication.aspx?name=SAP10195\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://www.digitaldefense.com/news/zero-day-vuln-d-link-vpn-routers/\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://www.dlink.com/en/security-bulletin\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;dlink -- dsr-150_firmware&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;A lack of input validation and access controls in Lua CGIs on D-Link DSR VPN routers may result in arbitrary input being passed to system command APIs, resulting in arbitrary command execution with root privileges. This affects DSR-150, DSR-250, DSR-500, and DSR-1000AC with firmware 3.14 and 3.17.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-15&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2020-25757&amp;amp;vector=AV:A/AC:L/Au:N/C:C/I:C/A:C\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;8.3&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-25757\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-25757&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://supportannouncement.us.dlink.com/announcement/publication.aspx?name=SAP10195\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://www.digitaldefense.com/news/zero-day-vuln-d-link-vpn-routers/\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://www.dlink.com/en/security-bulletin\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;docker -- adminer&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;The official adminer docker images before 4.7.0-fastcgi contain a blank password for a root user. System using the adminer docker container deployed by affected versions of the docker image may allow a remote attacker to achieve root access with a blank password.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-17&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2020-35186&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:L/Au:N/C:C/I:C/A:C\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;10&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-35186\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-35186&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://github.com/koharin/koharin2/blob/main/CVE-2020-35186\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;docker -- composer&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;The official composer docker images before 1.8.3 contain a blank password for a root user. System using the composer docker container deployed by affected versions of the docker image may allow a remote attacker to achieve root access with a blank password.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-17&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2020-35184&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:L/Au:N/C:C/I:C/A:C\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;10&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-35184\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-35184&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://github.com/koharin/koharin2/blob/main/CVE-2020-35184\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;docker -- docs&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;The Docker Docs Docker image through 2020-12-14 contains a blank password for the root user. Systems deployed using affected versions of the Docker Docs container may allow a remote attacker to achieve root access with a blank password.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-15&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2020-35467&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:L/Au:N/C:C/I:C/A:C\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;10&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-35467\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-35467&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://github.com/donghyunlee00/CVE/blob/main/CVE-2020-35467\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;docker -- ghost_alpine_docker_image&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;The official ghost docker images before 2.16.1-alpine (Alpine specific) contain a blank password for a root user. System using the ghost docker container deployed by affected versions of the docker image may allow a remote attacker to achieve root access with a blank password.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-17&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2020-35185&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:L/Au:N/C:C/I:C/A:C\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;10&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-35185\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-35185&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://github.com/koharin/koharin2/blob/main/CVE-2020-35185\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;docker -- haproxy&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;The official haproxy docker images before 1.8.18-alpine (Alpine specific) contain a blank password for a root user. System using the memcached docker container deployed by affected versions of the docker image may allow a remote attacker to achieve root access with a blank password.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-17&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2020-35197&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:L/Au:N/C:C/I:C/A:C\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;10&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-35197\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-35197&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://github.com/koharin/koharin2/blob/main/CVE-2020-35197\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;docker -- rabbitmq&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;The official rabbitmq docker images before 3.7.13-beta.1-management-alpine (Alpine specific) contain a blank password for a root user. System using the rabbitmq docker container deployed by affected versions of the docker image may allow a remote attacker to achieve root access with a blank password.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-17&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2020-35196&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:L/Au:N/C:C/I:C/A:C\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;10&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-35196\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-35196&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://github.com/koharin/koharin2/blob/main/CVE-2020-35196\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;docker -- registry&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;Versions of the Official registry Docker images through 2.7.0 contain a blank password for the root user. Systems deployed using affected versions of the registry container may allow a remote attacker to achieve root access with a blank password.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-11&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2020-29591&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:L/Au:N/C:C/I:C/A:C\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;10&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-29591\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-29591&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://github.com/docker/distribution-library-image\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://github.com/donghyunlee00/CVE/blob/main/CVE-2020-29591\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://hub.docker.com/_/registry\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;drupal -- drupal_docker_images&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;The official drupal docker images before 8.5.10-fpm-alpine (Alpine specific) contain a blank password for a root user. System using the drupal docker container deployed by affected versions of the docker image may allow a remote attacker to achieve root access with a blank password.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-17&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2020-35191&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:L/Au:N/C:C/I:C/A:C\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;10&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-35191\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-35191&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://github.com/koharin/koharin2/blob/main/CVE-2020-35191\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;epson -- eps_tse_server_8_firmware&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;Unrestricted access to the log downloader functionality in EPSON EPS TSE Server 8 (21.0.11) allows an unauthenticated attacker to remotely retrieve administrative hashed credentials via the maintenance/troubleshoot.php?download=1 URI.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-16&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2020-28929&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:L/Au:N/C:P/I:P/A:P\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;7.5&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-28929\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-28929&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://blog.bssi.fr/multiple-vulnerabilities-within-epson-eps-tse-server-8/#vulnerability-1\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;ethernut -- nut\\/os&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;An issue was discovered in the DNS implementation in Ethernut in Nut/OS 5.1. The length byte of a domain name in a DNS query/response is not checked, and is used for internal memory operations. This may lead to successful Denial-of-Service, and possibly Remote Code Execution.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-11&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2020-25110&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:L/Au:N/C:P/I:P/A:P\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;7.5&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-25110\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-25110&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://us-cert.cisa.gov/ics/advisories/icsa-20-343-01\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://www.kb.cert.org/vuls/id/815128\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;ethernut -- nut\\/os&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;An issue was discovered in the DNS implementation in Ethernut in Nut/OS 5.1. There is no check on whether a domain name has '\\0' termination. This may lead to successful Denial-of-Service, and possibly Remote Code Execution.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-11&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2020-25107&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:L/Au:N/C:P/I:P/A:P\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;7.5&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-25107\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-25107&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://us-cert.cisa.gov/ics/advisories/icsa-20-343-01\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://www.kb.cert.org/vuls/id/815128\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;ethernut -- nut\\/os&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;An issue was discovered in the DNS implementation in Ethernut in Nut/OS 5.1. The DNS response data length is not checked (it can be set to an arbitrary value from a packet). This may lead to successful Denial-of-Service, and possibly Remote Code Execution.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-11&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2020-25108&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:L/Au:N/C:P/I:P/A:P\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;7.5&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-25108\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-25108&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://us-cert.cisa.gov/ics/advisories/icsa-20-343-01\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://www.kb.cert.org/vuls/id/815128\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;ethernut -- nut\\/os&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;An issue was discovered in the DNS implementation in Ethernut in Nut/OS 5.1. The number of DNS queries/responses (set in a DNS header) is not checked against the data present. This may lead to successful Denial-of-Service, and possibly Remote Code Execution.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-11&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2020-25109&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:L/Au:N/C:P/I:P/A:P\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;7.5&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-25109\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-25109&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://us-cert.cisa.gov/ics/advisories/icsa-20-343-01\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://www.kb.cert.org/vuls/id/815128\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;f5 -- nginx_controller&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;In versions 3.0.0-3.9.0, 2.0.0-2.9.0, and 1.0.1, the NGINX Controller Agent does not use absolute paths when calling system utilities.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-11&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; Systems deployed using affected versions of the FullArmor HAPI File Share Mount container may allow the remote attacker to achieve root access with a blank password.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-15&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; System using the kong docker container deployed by affected versions of the docker image may allow a remote attacker to achieve root access with a blank password.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-17&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2020-35189&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:L/Au:N/C:C/I:C/A:C\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;10&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-35189\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-35189&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://github.com/koharin/koharin2/blob/main/CVE-2020-35189\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;liftoffsoftware -- gateone&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;GateOne allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands via shell metacharacters in the port field when attempting an SSH connection.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-14&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2020-20184&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:L/Au:N/C:P/I:P/A:P\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;7.5&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-20184\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-20184&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://github.com/liftoff/GateOne/issues/736\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;linux -- linux_kernel&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;A flaw was found in the Linux kernels implementation of MIDI, where an attacker with a local account and the permissions to issue an ioctl commands to midi devices, could trigger a use-after-free. A write to this specific memory while freed and before use could cause the flow of execution to change and possibly allow for memory corruption or privilege escalation.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-11&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2020-27786&amp;amp;vector=AV:L/AC:L/Au:N/C:C/I:C/A:C\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;7.2&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-27786\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-27786&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=1900933\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://git.kernel.org/pub/scm/linux/kernel/git/torvalds/linux.git/commit/?id=c1f6e3c818dd734c30f6a7eeebf232ba2cf3181d\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;macally -- wifisd2-2a82_firmware&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;In the Macally WIFISD2-2A82 Media and Travel Router 2.000.010, the Guest user is able to reset its own password. This process has a vulnerability which can be used to take over the administrator account and results in shell access. As the admin user may read the /etc/shadow file, the password hashes of each user (including root) can be dumped. The root hash can be cracked easily which results in a complete system compromise.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-14&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2020-29669&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:L/Au:S/C:C/I:C/A:C\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;9&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-29669\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-29669&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"http://packetstormsecurity.com/files/160478/Macally-WIFISD2-2A82-2.000.010-Privilege-Escalation.html\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://drive.google.com/file/d/1PpiRhhfph8U_0KAoIp0AnwY3mVtp-R-g/view\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://github.com/S1lkys/CVE-2020-29669\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;medtronic -- mycarelink_smart_model_25000_firmware&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;Medtronic MyCareLink Smart 25000 all versions are vulnerable to a race condition in the MCL Smart Patient Reader software update system, which allows unsigned firmware to be uploaded and executed on the Patient Reader. If exploited an attacker could remotely execute code on the MCL Smart Patient Reader device, leading to control of the device.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-14&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2020-27252&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:M/Au:N/C:C/I:C/A:C\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;9.3&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-27252\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-27252&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://us-cert.cisa.gov/ics/advisories/icsma-20-345-01\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;medtronic -- mycarelink_smart_model_25000_firmware&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;Medtronic MyCareLink Smart 25000 all versions are vulnerable when an attacker who gains auth runs a debug command, which is sent to the reader causing heap overflow in the MCL Smart Reader stack. A heap overflow allows attacker to remotely execute code on the MCL Smart Reader, could lead to control of device.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-14&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2020-25187&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:L/Au:N/C:C/I:C/A:C\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;10&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-25187\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-25187&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://us-cert.cisa.gov/ics/advisories/icsma-20-345-01\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;mobileviewpoint -- wireless_multiplex_terminal_playout_server&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;The Web Administrative Interface in Mobile Viewpoint Wireless Multiplex Terminal (WMT) Playout Server 20.2.8 and earlier has a default account with a password of \"pokon.\"&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-14&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2020-35338&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:L/Au:N/C:P/I:P/A:P\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;7.5&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-35338\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-35338&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://jeyaseelans.medium.com/cve-2020-35338-9e841f48defa\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://www.mobileviewpoint.com/\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;moutjs -- mout&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;This affects all versions of package mout. The deepFillIn function can be used to 'fill missing properties recursively', while the deepMixIn 'mixes objects into the target object, recursively mixing existing child objects as well'. In both cases, the key used to access the target object recursively is not checked, leading to a Prototype Pollution.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-11&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2020-35378&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:L/Au:N/C:P/I:P/A:P\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;7.5&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-35378\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-35378&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://www.exploit-db.com/exploits/49212\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;opener_project -- opener&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;An out-of-bounds write vulnerability exists in the Ethernet/IP server functionality of EIP Stack Group OpENer 2.3 and development commit 8c73bf3. A specially crafted series of network requests can lead to remote code execution. An attacker can send a sequence of requests to trigger this vulnerability.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-11&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2020-13556&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:L/Au:N/C:P/I:P/A:P\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;7.5&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-13556\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-13556&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://talosintelligence.com/vulnerability_reports/TALOS-2020-1170\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CONFIRM&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;opentsdb -- opentsdb&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;A remote code execution vulnerability occurs in OpenTSDB through 2.4.0 via command injection in the yrange parameter. The yrange value is written to a gnuplot file in the /tmp directory. This file is then executed via the mygnuplot.sh shell script. (tsd/GraphHandler.java attempted to prevent command injections by blocking backticks but this is insufficient.)&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-16&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2020-35476&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:L/Au:N/C:P/I:P/A:P\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;7.5&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-35476\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-35476&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://github.com/OpenTSDB/opentsdb/issues/2051\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;phpshe -- phpshe&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;PHPSHE 1.7 has SQL injection via the admin.php?mod=user&amp;amp;userlevel_id=1 userlevel_id[] parameter.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-11&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2020-19165&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:L/Au:N/C:P/I:P/A:P\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;7.5&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-19165\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-19165&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://github.com/Mint60/PHP/issues/1\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;plone -- plone&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;The official plone Docker images before version of 4.3.18-alpine (Alpine specific) contain a blank password for a root user. System using the plone docker container deployed by affected versions of the docker image may allow a remote attacker to achieve root access with a blank password.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-17&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; SIPLUS variants) (All versions &amp;lt; V8.3). A service available on port 10005/tcp of the affected devices could allow complete access to all services without authorization. An attacker could gain full control over an affected device, if he has access to this service. The system manual recommends to protect access to this port.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-14&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2020-25228&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:L/Au:N/C:C/I:C/A:C\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;10&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-25228\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-25228&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://cert-portal.siemens.com/productcert/pdf/ssa-480824.pdf\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CONFIRM&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;silver-peak -- ecos&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;The configuration backup/restore function in Silver Peak Unity ECOSTM (ECOS) appliance software was found to directly incorporate the user-controlled config filename in a subsequent shell command, allowing an attacker to manipulate the resulting command by injecting valid OS command input. This vulnerability can be exploited by an attacker with authenticated access to the Orchestrator UI or EdgeConnect UI. This affects all ECOS versions prior to: 8.1.9.15, 8.3.0.8, 8.3.1.2, 8.3.2.0, 9.0.2.0, and 9.1.0.0.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-11&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2020-12149&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:M/Au:S/C:C/I:C/A:C\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;8.5&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-12149\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-12149&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://www.silver-peak.com/support/user-documentation/security-advisories\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;silver-peak -- ecos&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;A command injection flaw identified in the nslookup API in Silver Peak Unity ECOSTM (ECOS) appliance software could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary commands with the privileges of the web server running on the EdgeConnect appliance. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to establish an interactive channel, effectively taking control of the target system. This vulnerability can be exploited by an attacker with authenticated access to the Orchestrator UI or EdgeConnect UI. This affects all ECOS versions prior to : 8.1.9.15, 8.3.0.8, 8.3.1.2, 8.3.2.0, 9.0.2.0, and 9.1.0.0.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-11&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2020-12148&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:M/Au:S/C:C/I:C/A:C\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;8.5&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-12148\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-12148&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://www.silver-peak.com/support/user-documentation/security-advisories\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;softwareag -- terracotta_server_oss&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;The Software AG Terracotta Server OSS Docker image 5.4.1 contains a blank password for the root user. Systems deployed using affected versions of the Terracotta Server OSS container may allow a remote attacker to achieve root access with a blank password.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-16&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2020-35469&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:L/Au:N/C:C/I:C/A:C\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;10&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-35469\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-35469&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://github.com/donghyunlee00/CVE/blob/main/CVE-2020-35469\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;solarwinds -- n-central&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;An issue was discovered in SolarWinds N-Central 12.3.0.670. The AdvancedScripts HTTP endpoint allows Relative Path Traversal by an authenticated user of the N-Central Administration Console (NAC), leading to execution of OS commands as root.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-16&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2020-25617&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:L/Au:S/C:C/I:C/A:C\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;9&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-25617\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-25617&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://ernw.de/en/publications.html\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://insinuator.net/2020/12/security-advisories-for-solarwinds-n-central/\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://support.solarwinds.com/SuccessCenter/s/\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;soliton -- filezen&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;Directory traversal vulnerability in FileZen versions from V3.0.0 to V4.2.2 allows remote attackers to upload an arbitrary file in a specific directory via unspecified vectors. As a result, an arbitrary OS command may be executed.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-14&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2020-5639&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:L/Au:N/C:C/I:C/A:C\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;10&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-5639\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-5639&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://jvn.jp/en/jp/JVN12884935/index.html\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://jvn.jp/jp/JVN12884935/index.html\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://www.soliton.co.jp/support/2020/004278.html\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;sonarsource -- sonarqube&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;The official sonarqube docker images before alpine (Alpine specific) contain a blank password for a root user.
