width: 5%;\"&gt;not yet calculated&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-29574\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-29574&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/sophos-fixes-sql-injection-vulnerability-in-their-cyberoam-os/\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://www.cyberoam.com/ngfw.html\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;spatie -- browsershot&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;This affects the package spatie/browsershot from 0.0.0. By specifying a URL in the file:// protocol an attacker is able to include arbitrary files in the resultant PDF.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-11&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;not yet calculated&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-7790\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-7790&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://github.com/spatie/browsershot/issues/441%23issue-735049731\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://snyk.io/vuln/SNYK-PHP-SPATIEBROWSERSHOT-1037064\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;sympa -- sympa&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;Sympa before 6.2.59b.2 allows remote attackers to obtain full SOAP API access by sending any arbitrary string (except one from an expired cookie) as the cookie value to authenticateAndRun.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-10&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;not yet calculated&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-29668\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-29668&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://bugs.debian.org/cgi-bin/bugreport.cgi?bug=976020\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://github.com/sympa-community/sympa/blob/6.2.59b.2/NEWS.md\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://github.com/sympa-community/sympa/issues/1041\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://github.com/sympa-community/sympa/pull/1044\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;teamspeak -- teamspeak&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;Versions of the Official teamspeak Docker images through 3.6.0 contain a blank password for the root user. Systems deployed using affected versions of the teamspeak container may allow a remote attacker to achieve root access with a blank password.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-11&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;not yet calculated&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-29590\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-29590&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvename.cgi?name=CVE-2019-5021\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvename.cgi?name=CVE-2020-29389\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://github.com/donghyunlee00/CVE/blob/main/CVE-2020-29590\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://hub.docker.com/_/teamspeak\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;tensorflow -- tensorflow&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;In affected versions of TensorFlow the tf.raw_ops.ImmutableConst operation returns a constant tensor created from a memory mapped file which is assumed immutable. However, if the type of the tensor is not an integral type, the operation crashes the Python interpreter as it tries to write to the memory area. If the file is too small, TensorFlow properly returns an error as the memory area has fewer bytes than what is needed for the tensor it creates. However, as soon as there are enough bytes, the above snippet causes a segmentation fault. This is because the allocator used to return the buffer data is not marked as returning an opaque handle since the needed virtual method is not overridden. This is fixed in versions 1.15.5, 2.0.4, 2.1.3, 2.2.2, 2.3.2, and 2.4.0.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-10&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;not yet calculated&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-26268\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-26268&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commit/c1e1fc899ad5f8c725dcbb6470069890b5060bc7\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/security/advisories/GHSA-hhvc-g5hv-48c6\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CONFIRM&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;tensorflow -- tensorflow&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;In affected versions of TensorFlow under certain cases a saved model can trigger use of uninitialized values during code execution. This is caused by having tensor buffers be filled with the default value of the type but forgetting to default initialize the quantized floating point types in Eigen. This is fixed in versions 1.15.5, 2.0.4, 2.1.3, 2.2.2, 2.3.2, and 2.4.0.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-10&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;not yet calculated&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-26266\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-26266&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commit/ace0c15a22f7f054abcc1f53eabbcb0a1239a9e2\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/security/advisories/GHSA-qhxx-j73r-qpm2\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CONFIRM&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;tensorflow -- tensorflow&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;In affected versions of TensorFlow the tf.raw_ops.DataFormatVecPermute API does not validate the src_format and dst_format attributes. The code assumes that these two arguments define a permutation of NHWC. This can result in uninitialized memory accesses, read outside of bounds and even crashes. This is fixed in versions 1.15.5, 2.0.4, 2.1.3, 2.2.2, 2.3.2, and 2.4.0.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-10&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;not yet calculated&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-26267\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-26267&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commit/ebc70b7a592420d3d2f359e4b1694c236b82c7ae\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/security/advisories/GHSA-c9f3-9wfr-wgh7\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CONFIRM&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;tensorflow -- tensorflow&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;In TensorFlow release candidate versions 2.4.0rc*, the general implementation for matching filesystem paths to globbing pattern is vulnerable to an access out of bounds of the array holding the directories. There are multiple invariants and preconditions that are assumed by the parallel implementation of GetMatchingPaths but are not verified by the PRs introducing it (#40861 and #44310). Thus, we are completely rewriting the implementation to fully specify and validate these. This is patched in version 2.4.0. This issue only impacts master branch and the release candidates for TF version 2.4. The final release of the 2.4 release will be patched.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-10&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;not yet calculated&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-26269\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-26269&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commit/8b5b9dc96666a3a5d27fad7179ff215e3b74b67c\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/security/advisories/GHSA-9jjw-hf72-3mxw\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CONFIRM&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;tensorflow -- tensorflow&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;In affected versions of TensorFlow under certain cases, loading a saved model can result in accessing uninitialized memory while building the computation graph. The MakeEdge function creates an edge between one output tensor of the src node (given by output_index) and the input slot of the dst node (given by input_index). This is only possible if the types of the tensors on both sides coincide, so the function begins by obtaining the corresponding DataType values and comparing these for equality. However, there is no check that the indices point to inside of the arrays they index into. Thus, this can result in accessing data out of bounds of the corresponding heap allocated arrays. In most scenarios, this can manifest as unitialized data access, but if the index points far away from the boundaries of the arrays this can be used to leak addresses from the library. This is fixed in versions 1.15.5, 2.0.4, 2.1.3, 2.2.2, 2.3.2, and 2.4.0.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-10&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;not yet calculated&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-26271\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-26271&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commit/0cc38aaa4064fd9e79101994ce9872c6d91f816b\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/security/advisories/GHSA-q263-fvxm-m5mw\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CONFIRM&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;tensorflow -- tensorflow&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;In affected versions of TensorFlow running an LSTM/GRU model where the LSTM/GRU layer receives an input with zero-length results in a CHECK failure when using the CUDA backend. This can result in a query-of-death vulnerability, via denial of service, if users can control the input to the layer. This is fixed in versions 1.15.5, 2.0.4, 2.1.3, 2.2.2, 2.3.2, and 2.4.0.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-10&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;not yet calculated&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-26270\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-26270&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commit/14755416e364f17fb1870882fa778c7fec7f16e3\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/security/advisories/GHSA-m648-33qf-v3gp\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CONFIRM&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;tikiwiki -- tikiwiki&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;TikiWiki 21.2 allows templates to be edited without CSRF protection. This could allow an unauthenticated, remote attacker to conduct a cross-site request forgery (CSRF) attack and perform arbitrary actions on an affected system. The vulnerability is due to insufficient CSRF protections for the web-based management interface of the affected system. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by persuading a user of the interface to follow a maliciously crafted link. A successful exploit could allow the attacker to perform arbitrary actions on an affected system with the privileges of the user. These action include allowing attackers to submit their own code through an authenticated user resulting in local file Inclusion. If an authenticated user who is able to edit TikiWiki templates visits an malicious website, template code can be edited.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-11&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;not yet calculated&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-29254\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-29254&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://github.com/S1lkys/CVE-2020-29254\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://github.com/S1lkys/CVE-2020-29254/blob/main/Tiki-Wiki%2021.2%20by%20Maximilian%20Barz.pdf\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://youtu.be/Uc3sRBitu50\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;totolink -- a3002ru_routers&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;TOTOLINK A3002RU-V2.0.0 B20190814.1034 allows authenticated remote users to modify the system's 'Run Command'. An attacker can use this functionality to execute arbitrary OS commands on the router.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-09&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;not yet calculated&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-25499\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-25499&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://github.com/kdoos/Vulnerabilities/blob/main/RCE_TOTOLINK-A3002RU-V2\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://www.totolink.net/home/index/newsss/id/196.html\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CONFIRM&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;ua-parser-js&amp;nbsp; -- ua-parser-js&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;The package ua-parser-js before 0.7.23 are vulnerable to Regular Expression Denial of Service (ReDoS) in multiple regexes (see linked commit for more info).&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-11&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;not yet calculated&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-7793\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-7793&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://github.com/faisalman/ua-parser-js/commit/6d1f26df051ba681463ef109d36c9cf0f7e32b18\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://snyk.io/vuln/SNYK-JAVA-ORGWEBJARSBOWERGITHUBFAISALMAN-1050388\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://snyk.io/vuln/SNYK-JAVA-ORGWEBJARSNPM-1050387\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://snyk.io/vuln/SNYK-JS-UAPARSERJS-1023599\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;uip -- uip&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;The code that processes DNS responses in uIP through 1.0, as used in Contiki and Contiki-NG, does not check whether the number of responses specified in the DNS packet header corresponds to the response data available in the DNS packet, leading to an out-of-bounds read and Denial-of-Service in resolv.c.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-11&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;not yet calculated&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-24334\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-24334&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://us-cert.cisa.gov/ics/advisories/icsa-20-343-01\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://www.kb.cert.org/vuls/id/815128\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;uip -- uip&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;An issue was discovered in uIP 1.0, as used in Contiki 3.0 and other products. The code that reassembles fragmented packets fails to properly validate the total length of an incoming packet specified in its IP header, as well as the fragmentation offset value specified in the IP header. By crafting a packet with specific values of the IP header length and the fragmentation offset, attackers can write into the .bss section of the program (past the statically allocated buffer that is used for storing the fragmented data) and cause a denial of service in uip_reass() in uip.c, or possibly execute arbitrary code on some target architectures.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-11&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;not yet calculated&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-17438\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-17438&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://us-cert.cisa.gov/ics/advisories/icsa-20-343-01\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://www.kb.cert.org/vuls/id/815128\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;uip -- uip&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;An issue was discovered in uIP 1.0, as used in Contiki 3.0 and other products. The code that parses incoming DNS packets does not validate that the incoming DNS replies match outgoing DNS queries in newdata() in resolv.c. Also, arbitrary DNS replies are parsed if there was any outgoing DNS query with a transaction ID that matches the transaction ID of an incoming reply. Provided that the default DNS cache is quite small (only four records) and that the transaction ID has a very limited set of values that is quite easy to guess, this can lead to DNS cache poisoning.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-11&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;not yet calculated&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-17439\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-17439&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://us-cert.cisa.gov/ics/advisories/icsa-20-343-01\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://www.kb.cert.org/vuls/id/815128\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;uip -- uip&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;An issue was discovered in uIP 1.0, as used in Contiki 3.0 and other products. The code that parses incoming DNS packets does not validate that domain names present in the DNS responses have '\\0' termination. This results in errors when calculating the offset of the pointer that jumps over domain name bytes in DNS response packets when a name lacks this termination, and eventually leads to dereferencing the pointer at an invalid/arbitrary address, within newdata() and parse_name() in resolv.c.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-11&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;not yet calculated&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-17440\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-17440&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://us-cert.cisa.gov/ics/advisories/icsa-20-343-01\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://www.kb.cert.org/vuls/id/815128\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;wago -- 750-88x_and_750-352_plc_devices&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;Older firmware versions (FW1 up to FW10) of the WAGO PLC family 750-88x and 750-352 are vulnerable for a special denial of service attack.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-10&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;not yet calculated&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-12516\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-12516&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://cert.vde.com/en-us/advisories/vde-2020-042\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CONFIRM&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;wecon -- levistudiou&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;A heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists within the WECON LeviStudioU Release Build 2019-09-21 and prior when processing project files. Opening a specially crafted project file could allow an attacker to exploit and execute code under the privileges of the application.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-09&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;not yet calculated&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-25199\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-25199&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://us-cert.cisa.gov/ics/advisories/icsa-20-238-03\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;western_digital -- dashboard&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;Western Digital Dashboard before 3.2.2.9 allows DLL Hijacking that leads to compromise of the SYSTEM account.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-12&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;not yet calculated&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-29654\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-29654&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://www.westerndigital.com/support/productsecurity/wdc-20011-western-digital-dashboard-privilege-escalation\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CONFIRM&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;western_digital -- my_cloud_os&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;An issue was discovered on Western Digital My Cloud OS 5 devices before 5.07.118. A NAS Admin authentication bypass vulnerability could allow an unauthenticated user to gain access to the device.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-12&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;not yet calculated&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-29563\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-29563&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://www.westerndigital.com/support/productsecurity/wdc-20010-my-cloud-os5-firmware-5-07-118\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CONFIRM&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;wireshark -- wireshark&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;Memory leak in RTPS protocol dissector in Wireshark 3.4.0 and 3.2.0 to 3.2.8 allows denial of service via packet injection or crafted capture file.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-11&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;not yet calculated&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-26420\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-26420&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://gitlab.com/gitlab-org/cves/-/blob/master/2020/CVE-2020-26420.json\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CONFIRM&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://gitlab.com/wireshark/wireshark/-/issues/16994\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://www.wireshark.org/security/wnpa-sec-2020-18.html\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;wireshark -- wireshark&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;Crash in USB HID protocol dissector and possibly other dissectors in Wireshark 3.4.0 and 3.2.0 to 3.2.8 allows denial of service via packet injection or crafted capture file.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-11&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;not yet calculated&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-26421\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-26421&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://gitlab.com/gitlab-org/cves/-/blob/master/2020/CVE-2020-26421.json\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CONFIRM&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://gitlab.com/wireshark/wireshark/-/issues/16958\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://www.wireshark.org/security/wnpa-sec-2020-17.html\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;wireshark -- wireshark&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;Memory leak in the dissection engine in Wireshark 3.4.0 allows denial of service via packet injection or crafted capture file.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-11&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;not yet calculated&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-26419\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-26419&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://gitlab.com/gitlab-org/cves/-/blob/master/2020/CVE-2020-26419.json\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CONFIRM&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://gitlab.com/wireshark/wireshark/-/issues/17032\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://www.wireshark.org/security/wnpa-sec-2020-19.html\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;wireshark -- wireshark&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;Memory leak in Kafka protocol dissector in Wireshark 3.4.0 and 3.2.0 to 3.2.8 allows denial of service via packet injection or crafted capture file.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-11&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;not yet calculated&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-26418\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-26418&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://gitlab.com/gitlab-org/cves/-/blob/master/2020/CVE-2020-26418.json\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CONFIRM&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://gitlab.com/wireshark/wireshark/-/issues/16739\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://www.wireshark.org/security/wnpa-sec-2020-16.html\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t&lt;/tbody&gt;\n&lt;/table&gt;\n&lt;a href=\"https://us-cert.cisa.gov#top\"&gt;Back to top&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/div&gt;\n\n            &lt;div class=\"field field--name-body field--type-text-with-summary field--label-hidden field--item\"&gt;&lt;p class=\"privacy-and-terms\"&gt;This product is provided subject to this &lt;a href=\"https://us-cert.cisa.gov/privacy/notification\"&gt;Notification&lt;/a&gt; and this &lt;a href=\"https://www.dhs.gov/privacy-policy\"&gt;Privacy &amp;amp; Use&lt;/a&gt; policy.&lt;/p&gt;\n\n\n&lt;/div&gt;\n      </description>\n  <pubDate>Mon, 14 Dec 2020 12:49:28 +0000</pubDate>\n    <dc:creator>CISA</dc:creator>\n    <guid isPermaLink=\"false\">15794 at https://us-cert.cisa.gov</guid>\n    </item>\n<item>\n\t<title>Vulnerability Summary for the Week of November 30, 2020</title>\n\t<link>https://us-cert.cisa.gov/ncas/bulletins/sb20-342</link>\n\t<description>Original release date: December 7, 2020&lt;br/&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\nThe CISA Weekly Vulnerability Summary Bulletin is created using information from the NIST &lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/search\"&gt;NVD&lt;/a&gt;. In some cases, the vulnerabilities in the Bulletin may not yet have assigned CVSS scores. Please visit NVD for updated vulnerability entries, which include CVSS scores once they are available.&lt;/p&gt;\n\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;a name=\"high\"&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\n\n&lt;div id=\"high_v\"&gt;\n&lt;h2 id=\"high_v_title\"&gt;High Vulnerabilities&lt;/h2&gt;\n\n&lt;table align=\"center\" border=\"1\" style=\"table-layout: fixed; width: 100%;\" summary=\"High Vulnerabilities\"&gt;\n\t&lt;thead&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;th class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"col\" style=\"width:24%;\"&gt;Primary&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\tVendor -- Product&lt;/th&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;th scope=\"col\" style=\"width:44%;\"&gt;Description&lt;/th&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;th scope=\"col\" style=\"width:10%;\"&gt;Published&lt;/th&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;th scope=\"col\" style=\"width:8%;\"&gt;CVSS Score&lt;/th&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;th scope=\"col\" style=\"width:14%;\"&gt;Source &amp;amp; Patch Info&lt;/th&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t&lt;/thead&gt;\n\t&lt;tbody&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;74cms -- 74cms&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;PHP remote file inclusion in the assign_resume_tpl method in Application/Common/Controller/BaseController.class.php in 74CMS before 6.0.48 allows remote code execution.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-02&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2020-29279&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:L/Au:N/C:P/I:P/A:P\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;7.5&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-29279\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-29279&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"http://www.74cms.com/news/show-2497.html\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://github.com/BigTiger2020/74CMS/blob/main/README.md\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;bloodx_project -- bloodx&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;SQL injection vulnerability in BloodX 1.0 allows attackers to bypass authentication.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-02&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2020-29282&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:L/Au:N/C:P/I:P/A:P\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;7.5&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-29282\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-29282&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://github.com/BigTiger2020/BloodX-CMS/blob/main/README.md\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://github.com/diveshlunker/BloodX\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://www.exploit-db.com/exploits/48786\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;br-automation -- industrial_automation_aprol&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;An issue was discovered in B&amp;amp;R Industrial Automation APROL before R4.2 V7.08. Arbitrary commands could be injected (using Python scripts) via the AprolCluster script that is invoked via sudo and thus executes with root privileges, a different vulnerability than CVE-2019-16364.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-11-27&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2019-19875&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:L/Au:N/C:C/I:C/A:C\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;10&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2019-19875\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2019-19875&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://www.br-automation.com/downloads_br_productcatalogue/BRP44400000000000000585952/APROL_R42_A1_ReleaseNotes_001.pdf\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;br-automation -- industrial_automation_aprol&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;An issue was discovered in B&amp;amp;R Industrial Automation APROL before R4.2 V7.08. The AprolLoader could be used to inject and execute arbitrary unintended commands via an unspecified attack scenario, a different vulnerability than CVE-2019-16364.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-11-27&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2019-19872&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:L/Au:N/C:P/I:P/A:P\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;7.5&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2019-19872\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2019-19872&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://www.br-automation.com/downloads_br_productcatalogue/BRP44400000000000000585952/APROL_R42_A1_ReleaseNotes_001.pdf\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;br-automation -- industrial_automation_aprol&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;An issue was discovered in B&amp;amp;R Industrial Automation APROL before R4.2 V7.08. An EnMon PHP script was vulnerable to SQL injection, a different vulnerability than CVE-2019-10006.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-11-27&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2019-19876&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:L/Au:N/C:P/I:P/A:P\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;7.5&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2019-19876\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2019-19876&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://www.br-automation.com/downloads_br_productcatalogue/BRP44400000000000000585952/APROL_R42_A1_ReleaseNotes_001.pdf\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;br-automation -- industrial_automation_aprol&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;An issue was discovered in B&amp;amp;R Industrial Automation APROL before R4.2 V7.08. Some web scripts in the web interface allowed injection and execution of arbitrary unintended commands on the web server, a different vulnerability than CVE-2019-16364.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-11-27&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2019-19874&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:L/Au:N/C:P/I:P/A:P\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;7.5&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2019-19874\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2019-19874&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://www.br-automation.com/downloads_br_productcatalogue/BRP44400000000000000585952/APROL_R42_A1_ReleaseNotes_001.pdf\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;c-blosc2_project -- c-blosc2&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;blosc2.c in Blosc C-Blosc2 through 2.0.0.beta.5 has a heap-based buffer overflow when there is a lack of space to write compressed data.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-11-27&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2020-29367&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:M/Au:N/C:C/I:C/A:C\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;9.3&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-29367\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-29367&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://bugs.chromium.org/p/oss-fuzz/issues/detail?id=26442\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://github.com/Blosc/c-blosc2/commit/c4c6470e88210afc95262c8b9fcc27e30ca043ee\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;car_rental_management_system_project -- car_rental_management_system&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;An SQL injection vulnerability was discovered in Car Rental Management System v1.0 can be exploited via the id parameter in view_car.php or the car_id parameter in booking.php.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-02&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2020-29287&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:L/Au:N/C:P/I:P/A:P\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;7.5&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-29287\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-29287&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://github.com/BigTiger2020/Car-Rental-Management-System/blob/main/README.md\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://www.exploit-db.com/exploits/49056\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://www.sourcecodester.com/php/14544/car-rental-management-system-using-phpmysqli-source-code.html\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;cloudfoundry -- capi-release&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;CAPI (Cloud Controller) versions prior to 1.101.0 are vulnerable to a denial-of-service attack in which an unauthenticated malicious attacker can send specially-crafted YAML files to certain endpoints, causing the YAML parser to consume excessive CPU and RAM.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-02&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2020-5423&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:L/Au:N/C:N/I:N/A:C\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;7.8&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-5423\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-5423&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://www.cloudfoundry.org/blog/cve-2020-5423\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CONFIRM&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;crux -- crux&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;The official Crux Linux Docker images 3.0 through 3.4 contain a blank password for a root user. System using the Crux Linux Docker container deployed by affected versions of the Docker image may allow an attacker to achieve root access with a blank password.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-02&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2020-29389&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:L/Au:N/C:C/I:C/A:C\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;10&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-29389\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-29389&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://github.com/koharin/koharin2/blob/main/CVE-2020-29389\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;edimax -- ic-3116w_firmware&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;A stack-based buffer-overflow exists in Edimax IP-Camera IC-3116W (v3.06) and IC-3140W (v3.07), which allows an unauthenticated, unauthorized attacker to perform remote-code-execution due to a crafted GET-Request. The overflow occurs in binary ipcam_cgi due to a missing type check in function doGetSysteminfo(). This has been fixed in version: IC-3116W v3.08.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-01&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2020-26762&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:L/Au:N/C:P/I:P/A:P\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;7.5&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-26762\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-26762&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://www.edimax.com/edimax/download/download/data/edimax/de/download/for_home/home_network_cameras/home_network_cameras_indoor_fixed/ic-3116w\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CONFIRM&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;fujitsu -- eternus_storage_dx200_s4_firmware&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;An issue was discovered on Fujitsu Eternus Storage DX200 S4 devices through 2020-11-25. width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2020-29283&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:L/Au:N/C:P/I:P/A:P\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;7.5&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-29283\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-29283&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://github.com/BigTiger2020/Online-Doctor-Appointment-Booking-System-PHP/blob/main/README.md\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://projectworlds.in/free-projects/php-projects/online-doctor-appointment-booking-system-php-and-mysql\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;pcanalyser -- pc_analyser&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;An issue was discovered in Devid Espenschied PC Analyser through 4.10. The PCADRVX64.SYS kernel driver exposes IOCTL functionality that allows low-privilege users to read and write arbitrary physical memory. This could lead to arbitrary Ring-0 code execution and escalation of privileges.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-11-27&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2020-28922&amp;amp;vector=AV:L/AC:L/Au:N/C:C/I:C/A:C\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;7.2&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-28922\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-28922&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"http://www.pcanalyser.de/index.php/historie/\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://github.com/eset/vulnerability-disclosures\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://github.com/eset/vulnerability-disclosures/blob/master/CVE-2020-28922/CVE-2020-28922.md\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;pcanalyser -- pc_analyser&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;An issue was discovered in Devid Espenschied PC Analyser through 4.10. The PCADRVX64.SYS kernel driver exposes IOCTL functionality that allows low-privilege users to read and write to arbitrary Model Specific Registers (MSRs). This could lead to arbitrary Ring-0 code execution and escalation of privileges.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-11-27&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; A remote attacker does not need to log in. By sending malicious SQL statements, because the device does not properly filter parameters, successful use can obtain management rights. This affects: ZXV10 W908 all versions before MIPS_A_1022IPV6R3T6P7Y20.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-01&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2020-6880&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:L/Au:N/C:P/I:P/A:P\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;7.5&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-6880\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-6880&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"http://www.zxelink.com.cn/website/html/CommonContent.html?classify=news&amp;amp;id=43&amp;amp;menuID=20201126153313319\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t&lt;/tbody&gt;\n&lt;/table&gt;\n&lt;a href=\"https://us-cert.cisa.gov#top\"&gt;Back to top&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/div&gt;\n\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;a name=\"medium\"&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/p&gt;\n\n&lt;div id=\"medium_v\"&gt;\n&lt;h2 id=\"medium_v_title\"&gt;Medium Vulnerabilities&lt;/h2&gt;\n\n&lt;table align=\"center\" border=\"1\" style=\"table-layout: fixed; width: 100%;\" summary=\"Medium Vulnerabilities\"&gt;\n\t&lt;thead&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;th class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"col\" style=\"width:24%;\"&gt;Primary&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\tVendor -- Product&lt;/th&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;th scope=\"col\" style=\"width:44%;\"&gt;Description&lt;/th&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;th scope=\"col\" style=\"width:10%;\"&gt;Published&lt;/th&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;th scope=\"col\" style=\"width:8%;\"&gt;CVSS Score&lt;/th&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;th scope=\"col\" style=\"width:14%;\"&gt;Source &amp;amp; Patch Info&lt;/th&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t&lt;/thead&gt;\n\t&lt;tbody&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;advancedsystemcare -- advanced_systemcare&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;There is a local denial of service vulnerability in Advanced SystemCare 13 PRO 13.5.0.174. The attacker will not see any data but may inject data into the body of the subsequent request.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-11-28&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td kibana&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;The elasticsearch-operator does not validate the namespace where kibana logging resource is created and due to that it is possible to replace the original openshift-logging console link (kibana console) to different one, created based on the new CR for the new kibana resource. This could lead to an arbitrary URL redirection or the openshift-logging console link damage. This flaw affects elasticsearch-operator-container versions before 4.7.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-02&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2020-27816&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:M/Au:N/C:P/I:P/A:N\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;5.8&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-27816\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-27816&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=1902698\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;hcltech -- domino&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;HCL Domino is susceptible to a lockout policy bypass vulnerability in the ID Vault service. An unauthenticated attacker could use this vulnerability to mount a brute force attack against the ID Vault service.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-01&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2020-4128&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:L/Au:N/C:P/I:N/A:N\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;5&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-4128\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-4128&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://support.hcltechsw.com/csm?id=kb_article&amp;amp;sysparm_article=KB0085408\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;hcltech -- hcl_domino&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;HCL Domino is susceptible to a lockout policy bypass vulnerability in the LDAP service. An unauthenticated attacker could use this vulnerability to mount a brute force attack against the LDAP service. Fixes are available in HCL Domino versions 9.0.1 FP10 IF6, 10.0.1 FP6 and 11.0.1 FP1 and later.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-01&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2020-4129&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:L/Au:N/C:P/I:N/A:N\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;5&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-4129\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-4129&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://support.hcltechsw.com/csm?id=kb_article&amp;amp;sysparm_article=KB0085407\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;hcltech -- hcl_domino&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;HCL Domino is susceptible to a Login CSRF vulnerability. With a valid credential, an attacker could trick a user into accessing a system under another ID or use an intranet user's system to access internal systems from the internet. Fixes are available in HCL Domino versions 9.0.1 FP10 IF6, 10.0.1 FP6 and 11.0.1 FP1 and later.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-11-30&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2020-4127&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:M/Au:N/C:P/I:N/A:N\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;4.3&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-4127\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-4127&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://support.hcltechsw.com/csm?id=kb_article&amp;amp;sysparm_article=KB0085409\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;hcltech -- hcl_inotes&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;HCL iNotes is susceptible to a sensitive cookie exposure vulnerability. This can allow an unauthenticated remote attacker to capture the cookie by intercepting its transmission within an http session. Fixes are available in HCL Domino and iNotes versions 10.0.1 FP6 and 11.0.1 FP2 and later.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-01&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2020-4126&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:M/Au:N/C:P/I:N/A:N\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;4.3&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-4126\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-4126&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://support.hcltechsw.com/csm?id=kb_article&amp;amp;sysparm_article=KB0085411\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;hibernate -- hibernate_orm&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;A flaw was found in hibernate-core in versions prior to and including 5.4.23.Final. A SQL injection in the implementation of the JPA Criteria API can permit unsanitized literals when a literal is used in the SQL comments of the query. This flaw could allow an attacker to access unauthorized information or possibly conduct further attacks. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to data confidentiality and integrity.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-02&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2020-25638&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:M/Au:N/C:P/I:P/A:N\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;5.8&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-25638\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-25638&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=1881353\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;huawei -- fusioncompute&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;Huawei FusionCompute versions 6.5.1 and 8.0.0 have a command injection vulnerability. An authenticated, remote attacker can craft specific request to exploit this vulnerability. Due to insufficient verification, this could be exploited to cause the attackers to obtain higher privilege.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-01&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2020-9116&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:L/Au:S/C:P/I:P/A:P\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;6.5&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-9116\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-9116&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://www.huawei.com/en/psirt/security-advisories/huawei-sa-20201118-01-fusioncompute-en\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;huawei -- nova_4_firmware&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;HUAWEI nova 4 versions earlier than 10.0.0.165(C01E34R2P4) and SydneyM-AL00 versions earlier than 10.0.0.165(C00E66R1P5) have an out-of-bounds read and write vulnerability. An attacker with specific permissions crafts malformed packet with specific parameter and sends the packet to the affected products. Due to insufficient validation of packet, which may be exploited to cause the information leakage or arbitrary code execution.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-01&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2020-9117&amp;amp;vector=AV:L/AC:L/Au:N/C:P/I:P/A:P\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;4.6&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-9117\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-9117&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://www.huawei.com/en/psirt/security-advisories/huawei-sa-20201125-01-outofboundread-en\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;ibm -- cloud_pak_for_security&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;IBM Cloud Pak for Security 1.3.0.1(CP4S) does not invalidate session after logout which could allow an authenticated user to obtain sensitive information from the previous session. IBM X-Force ID: 186789.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-11-30&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2020-4696&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:L/Au:S/C:P/I:N/A:N\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;4&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-4696\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-4696&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/186789\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;XF&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://www.ibm.com/support/pages/node/6372528\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CONFIRM&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;ibm -- cloud_pak_for_security&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;IBM Cloud Pak for Security 1.3.0.1 (CP4S) could reveal sensitive information about the internal network to an authenticated user using a specially crafted HTTP request. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information from the cookie.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-11-30&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; A malicious client could use this flaw to send a specially crafted message that, when processed by the VNC server, would lead to a floating point exception, resulting in a denial of service.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-11-27&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2020-25708&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:L/Au:N/C:N/I:N/A:P\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;5&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2020-25708\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2020-25708&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=1896739\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;libxls_project -- libxls&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;An exploitable Out-of-bounds Write vulnerability exists in the xls_addCell function of libxls 2.0. An attacker can send malicious xls file to trigger this vulnerability.&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center;\"&gt;2020-12-02&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: center; width: 5%;\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/cvss.cfm?version=2&amp;amp;name=CVE-2017-2910&amp;amp;vector=AV:N/AC:M/Au:N/C:P/I:P/A:P\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"CVSS V2 Score\"&gt;6.8&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"https://nvd.nist.gov/nvd.cfm?cvename=CVE-2017-2910\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;CVE-2017-2910&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;a href=\"https://talosintelligence.com/vulnerability_reports/TALOS-2017-0417\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;MISC&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t&lt;/tr&gt;\n\t\t&lt;tr&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td class=\"vendor-product\" scope=\"row\" style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;linux -- linux_kernel&lt;/td&gt;\n\t\t\t&lt;td style=\"text-align: left;\"&gt;An issue was discovered in __split_huge_pmd in mm/huge_memory.c in the Linux kernel before 5.7.5.
